desc: We believe in loving the Earth and yourself. We offer gardening, meditation, and massage products and more. Let us support you on your self care journey today!

layout.text: Welcome to The Simple Living Store!

We want to do what we can to help, so monthly the Founder of The Simple Living Store chooses a charity to donate to. This month is special. In July of 2021, the CEO's father passed due to the after effects of late stage alcoholism. In his honor, for both July and August, 5% of sales will be donated to Alcoholics Anonymous.
